segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the center of the room where two children are up to something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet, specifically a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The label 'COOKIE JAR' is quite clear, and it's full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the stool's legs are splayed; it looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It could tip backward at any moment, and he would surely fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a dangerous position to be in for a few cookies!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little accomplice, a girl, stands nearby, reaching up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about them getting hurt; that stool is a real hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This secret mission is filled with peril.
segments.speaker: PAR
